website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you need a large, rugged kennel, but the Advantek edges it out slightly for overall value and features.
pros: Versatile for all sizes of dogs – made of durable chain link with a stable frame
cons: It doesn't have a top – if you want the waterproof cover, you have to purchase it separately

customer_reviews.title: Soft chain link
customer_reviews.text: Our 52 lb Lab broke thru the chain link within an hour of being put in this kennel. The chain link bends too easy. To make it worse, I had already spent extra time and money an attached the chain link to the frame with hose clamps instead of the included wire ties
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a kinda cheap but sturdy kennel since our fence has some gaps between the ground and the bottom this kennel was Super easy to put together I added zip ties to wrap the chain link to the poles instead of the wires. It’s a pretty sturdy cage for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Sturdy materials
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, Sturdy materials. Idea for use: We use it in our garage as a larger crate area for our doggies, and put an open carrier crate inside as a cubby bed. Our dogs love the secure feeling of their open door bed-crate for a nap, while being able to roam in a larger area for eating and using pee pee pads when we are gone for short periods of time. I say "crate" and they happily jump right in for nap-time. If you have to leave your dog for work, it is a much better set up than putting them in just the small crate-carrier-cage situation without food water or a way to go potty.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the wrost thing I ever bought when I revived the package the box had previously been opened and taped back up then one we open the box it had been returned previously and had the other person screwdriver and knife in the box. Then once we get it together can clearly see it was used put my dog in the cage for her to get out because it wasn't all there and we couldn't put together properly. I now have a cage I can't use for my dog and I'm out my money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... spent 4 hours untangling it and it still isn't perfect the screws strip very easily pass on this product
customer_reviews.text: The chain link came in a knotted mess and I've spent 4 hours untangling it and it still isn't perfect the screws strip very easily pass on this product
customer_reviews.author: Zeus

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly with two people
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly with two people, 30-40 minutes. Working with chain link is a little tricky if never worked with one. Plenty of room for two small dogs, light weight. The metal to link fence to frame were a little cumbersome, definitely need needle nose or pliers to bend the ends and attach to frame. Otherwise, great to have, portable, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen Haas corteguera

customer_reviews.title: Great product for small to medium dogs or cats
customer_reviews.text: Great product for small to medium dogs or cats. My large dog (80 lbs) figured out the door and forced it open within an hour. Be sure to tighten the latch bolts securely as the latch is prone to rotate on the pole if the dog pushes on the gate. Further, this product differed from the description and was 5.5' wide, 5' deep, and 4' high rather than the described 5'w, 4'd, 5'h. All this aside, the quality of the materials and the relative low price of the product makes this an excellent choice for pet management.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: directions are difficult to follow... and the product is NOT at described. It is not 2 set up options!
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: This was a devil to put together - the directions ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a devil to put together - the directions were not very clear and the vertical wires kept unravelling and required two of us to rewind them all the way to the top before the final installation. My husband had to reinforce all the connections with a heavier wire to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: CJR- Galt

customer_reviews.title: ... a Pit bull mix with Rottweiler and it's a pretty big Kennel for him is a good
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pit bull mix with Rottweiler and it's a pretty big Kennel for him is a good size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great cage! Many people in other reviews complained that it's hard to put together and that the wire's all tangled up. Putting the frame together was pretty easy and self explanatory, and yes the wire was like solving a bent nail puzzle at times haha. But for a dog cage of this size and quality I'd say it's worth it at under $200. I put it together in one afternoon by myself. Also I took out about five pieces of wire to get an extra tight fit. Summary: Buy it, Put in the extra work, save a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: David - chance@midwest.net

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Came missing pieces, the fence wires werent together correctly and dont sit correctly on the bars. My dogs have torn this apart, waste of money & would never buy another one or recommend to anyone. Your better off going to Lowe’s or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The chain link came all knotted and apart. I actually had to zip tie the chain link to keep it together. The screws were welded to the actual pipes you need to u screw them from! I’ve asked for a refund for both. The latch that you put on the gate no matter how tight you tighten it comes loose and a pack and get out so you’ll have to buy another latch if you keep this
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: SMALL AND CHEAP MADE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheap made! Or I should say not made....we spent 3 hours hooked links together to build this pen that came in a box the size of something that would fit in my cars trunk! Totally misleading! To my trouble to dissemble in order to return! SO SMALL!!!! Pics are not right!! It’s to small for a chicken or chihuahua to use! Totally not happy and will be selling it as is to someone online to come pickup in the bed of their truck! My dog had more room in her indoor kennel dog house!!
customer_reviews.author: David Sanderlin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: The instructions must have been put together by a 2 year old... the chain link arrived all tangled... it’s extremely easy to move so I wouldn’t buy this for a large dog... takes a lot longer than 30 minutes to assemble... overall very unsatisfied and would return it if my husband didn’t already put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: The screws are difficult to remove, then if we couldn't get them tight enough to secure the frame very well. I would really recommend you add some sort of zip tie instead of the wire wrapping around the framework. The wire is difficult to work with at best. Since I am using this more as a chicken run and not a dog pen I feel it was worth my money, however I would never put a very active dog in this pen and expect for it to hold them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Beasley

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: If I can put this together anyone can do it! If you pay attention and follow the directions it will take about 1 hour to put together. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend purchasing another product
customer_reviews.text: The metal posts went together fine, the chain link itself was very tangled and chinsy...we're going to have to purchase another product to replace it. Not pleased since this product was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great fence for my small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I was worried with all the negative reviews however they were wrong if you spend the time (4-5 hours) to put it together properly it is very sturdy and strong. I did have to get more wire to make additional ties for the fence to secure it properly other than that though excellent product .
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: It does its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that it really helps. The downfall is how sturdy it is. I have to say the door part doesn't do a good seal and we had to add zip ties because the crappy metal tiers it comes ith sucks. Use zip ties and you have a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Kennel
customer_reviews.text: For the money and free shipping through Prime... Excellent product. I purchased the 5'x10'x4'. Two slight modifications: I used a heavier gauge chain link (I had from a previous fence) and I cut the top rail at the door- attached a union to make the rail piece removable (to maintain rigidity) as to allow for access to the kennel easier rather than constantly bending down. I only use the kennel for bathroom purposes so my dog (165 bull mastiff) is only in there 5 -15 min tops but is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Dogs got out first night and disappeared :( the chain link easily pulled away from bars.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: The chain link should be better wrap so you don't need an engineer to re do it.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the best is that the frame and the door were the easiest to put up. What I dislike the most is that whoever bundled the remainder of the chain link fence needs to perform hari karri. It has been a complete tangled mess. I rolled it out on a flat surface like the directions said and have been spending 2 hours so far in trying to untangle it. That part is absolutely terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It has worked good so far
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my garage when I'm boarding dogs. My husband did have to use zip ties to give it some added security. It has worked good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This dog run was a trip to put together. The finished product sits on a cement floor that is level, but the door is not "square" and and looks crooked. We got it for a rabbit, so it's been indoors for a year, and still shows no wear. This has been a great rabbit pen.
customer_reviews.author: star gazer

customer_reviews.title: I am using it for my small birds like bantam chickens or small ducks with only 3 in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small short kennel. I am using it for my small birds like bantam chickens or small ducks with only 3 in the kennel. It was a little aggrevating to put together. It was not difficult, but it does require strength to pull the wire. I am female and average strength. I had to have my husband help me. I would not recommend putting a dog or such in it unless it is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToRead°💕🌻

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product, don’t waste your time or money. Took forever to set up and only lasted two days because my dog was able to break through the incredibly cheap “chain link” which ended up making it completely useless
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Ames

customer_reviews.title: Too much assembly
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to assemble! The chain link comes all twisted up in a bundle, had to reweave it in certain places. I thought it would come with panels to attach as it advertised easy assembly but you are basically constructing the thing peice by peice..once assembled it’s nice. Definitely only for small animals/dogs as it is pretty lightweight. If I wanted to build my own fence I could’ve just gone to Home Depot and bought all this..I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hennings

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. Looks like it should hold up ok
customer_reviews.text: A warning, lots of assembly required. I wanted to build a fence, didn't want to build an exact kennel. Did not match my expectations. You get a roll of fencing and a bunch of posts to build a kennel. You have to do attach all fencing to all supports. It's a royal pain. It looks great. Looks like it should hold up ok. Much thinner than other older kennels.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Napier

customer_reviews.title: Must be assembled. Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Great little kennel. I must be the only one...it's a 5 x 5 square! I thought it was a 4 x 5 box that was 5' high. BE CAREFULLER THAN I WAS.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Links were all tangled, the gate links were all undone, so flimsy my 1lb chihuahua wen through. Do NOT buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B. Hearron

customer_reviews.title: Was a great starter though too small for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Was a great starter though too small for what we needed. Added six feet around and tall he has a shady place and additional running area.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L Webster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. i had a blonde moment and didn't think about it not being assembled! But other than my oversight, it's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not very big
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the picture makes it look much larger than it actually is. Unfortunately I have not used it for it's intended purpose as the little furry baby that I purchased it for never got the chance to really enjoy it. It is definitely a two person job on the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. Really really. Is not heavy duty at all, bent apart so easy. The only reason I'm not returning it is because I'm not going through the trouble of packaging it back up. Worthless and will NOT keep a dog 20+ pounds secure.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty good until it came to the fencing I have never seen anything so cheaply built. And than my 4 month old puppy went threw it in less than 10 minute made a big hole in the fencing she was a whopping 23 lbs. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fence what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fence what I expected, keeps in my two angora bunny rabbits just fine. You would need to reinforce some if you have a large dog that is an escape artist
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog tore right threw this like it was nothing and the poles aren't that strong ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog tore right threw this like it was nothing and the poles aren't that strong I have one that is cracked right down middle made for small dogs. If your dog is over 40 lbs don't bother save your money.

customer_reviews.title: the fencing is a terrible mess. Tangled badly.
customer_reviews.text: i have spent 5 hours trying to untangle the fence. Still not done. Would be rated much higher if they were to insert a piece of cardboard into the fence as they roll it.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We set ours up on a concrete slab and it is working great we loved it for are dog

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this pen for my dog to stay in while me and my family went out of town. I had someone that came throughout the days to check on them. First day gone, they tore through the fencing. Not sure if my dog is really strong or the fencing is really weak, but it didnt do its job very well, at all.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Had a little bit of a hard time putting the fence on. Got tangled easily. Putting up the frame was simple. I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Far from sturdy, good for little yorkie sized dogs and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Far from sturdy, good for little yorkie sized dogs and no bigger. My 1 year old black lab mixed pushed himself through the chain link in a hour and a half. Sold it immediately!

customer_reviews.title: It works great for my little guys and is tall enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't a one person job putting this together, but we got it done! It works great for my little guys and is tall enough to keep large dogs out.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product with missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: It works well as far as set up was pretty easy .screws were preset and we had 5 missing. Other than that it was fine.

customer_reviews.title: This is probably a good product if you don't have a strong escape artist

product_meta.title: Lucky Dog Galvanized Chain Link Kennel
product_meta.description:
Size:4 x 5 x 5'

Lucky Dog Heavy Duty Chain Link - Dog Kennel Enclosure - Includes Rust Resistant Galvanized Chain Link roll and Powder-Coated frame, Dog-safe Lockable Gate Latch, Steel Wire Ties

This pen is built with sturdy steel frame construction with rust-resistant coating for durability. This kennel will keep your pet safe while they enjoy the outdoors.

The main features of the dog cage include:

Easier to setup than most others, chain link won't kink or tangle - Frame fits together easily and tightens with set screws.Optional Waterproof Cover Kit (sold separately) - Steel roof frame and heavy tarp cover fit perfectly giving your pet full protection from rain, sun or snow. If your pet is an escape artist, the roof and cover will help deter them from climbing out. This is the perfect steel outdoor pen kennel for any dog, puppy or small animal. Be prepared for more dog kisses as your pet will love you for getting a safe, convenient, and perfectly sized fit home.

About Lucky Dog:

Our motto is, “Every home deserves a good dog and every dog deserves a good home.” We keep that idea in mind with every Lucky Dog product we create. Our line of Lucky Dog Kennels and accessories is everything you need to keep your dog happy and safe while you are away. Your pet’s safety is at the forefront of all product development and construction, and we are moving towards using more environmentally responsible processes in our production. We are proud to have served families and their pets with the Lucky Dog pet brand for over twenty years and look forward to many more years serving the needs of pets across the country.



WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including Di(2-ethylhexyl)phthalate (DEHP) which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov.
feature_bullets: EASY TO SETUP - This chain link box kennel has a heavy duty steel frame that can be assembled by one person. The galvanized chain link roll will not kink or get tangled.

GALVANIZED CHAIN LINK STEEL FRAME KENNEL - The Lucky Dog chain link box kennel is perfect for residential DIY use. Frame corners are welded before coating to prevent sharp edges and offers greater rust and corrosion protection.

STEEL WIRE TIES INCLUDED - The Lucky Dog Enclosure Pet System includes steel wire ties for securing the chain link to the frame, not soft aluminum like other brands which can easily be removed by your pet.
EASY TO CLEAN - 1.5" raised legs make the enclosure easy to sweep or hose out to prevent the buildup of dirt and bacteria, keeping your pet healthy and happy.
SAFE FOR YOUR PET - Keep your pet safe in this galvanized chain link steel pen as they enjoy the freedom of being outdoors while not on a leash.
